## 😆Execute

```bash
$ npm run develop
```

## 😎Deploy

```bash
$ npm run deploy
```

## 👻Component structure

> Atomic Design Pattern

    .
    └── components
            ├── atoms
            ├── molecules
            ├── organisms
            └── templates
